code_files.context_snippet:
def test_stderr_pipe(self):
    # stderr redirection
    p = subprocess.Popen([sys.executable, "-c",
                      'import sys; sys.stderr.write("strawberry")'],
                     stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
    with p:
        self.assertEqual(p.stderr.read(), b"strawberry")

triple_sequences.action_description: Spawns new process to execute command without shell access
Reads all bytes from process standard error
